title: Allow the analyze Stream Evaluator to operate outside of a stream
description:
Currently the analyze Stream Evaluator only works within a select or cartesianProduct stream. It would be useful for the analyze Stream Evaluator to work if it is called on its own.

Syntax:

t = analyze("hello world", analyzerField)
